description: The Edwards Endowed Scholarship is open to a declared PGA Golf Management major. The student must have a minimum 3.0 cumulative GPA, completed 30 hours at UCO at the time of application, played golf on their high school team, and successfully completed at least one internship within the PGM program. One faculty recommendation is required (please indicate the College of Business faculty member on your application that you wish to supply a recommendation). Eligibility Requirements Declared PGA Golf Management major Minimum cumulative GPA of 3.0 or higher Completed at least 15 credit hours at UCO Played golf on their high school team Successfully completed at least one internship within the PGM program. One faculty recommendation is required (please indicate the College of Business faculty member on your application that you wish to supply a recommendation).
